description: Complete system overview documenting the well data preprocessing system architecture, component interactions, and high-level workflow
Detailed documentation of the well identification algorithm, LAS header parsing logic, and data extraction patterns for well metadata
Comprehensive documentation of the DepthValidationResult dataclass, validation algorithms, and feedback generation system
Documentation of the state management system, including well_datasets mapping, state cleanup mechanisms, and cross-contamination prevention
Detailed documentation of the custom error handling system, warning generation, and error tracking mechanisms
